Room.Name: Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Taragon Road, near its southern end, between the wall and a pub.
Room.LongDescription: A few steps north is the Deft Hand, a rather dark and dismal little place. Immediately to the west is a tailor's shop, which advertises they can fit a half-giant or an elf. A number of nice looking capes are on display in the window, and a couple of wizard's gowns are on display dummys.
